ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode , 'GBP') ), ISNEW(), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Exclusive_Project', NOT(ISBLANK( os_Unit__c )) , NOT(ISPICKVAL( os_Unit__r.os_Status__c , 'Available')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not create Inquiry for Unit which is not Available
